attributes.action: Stop portraying unrealistic ideas of the perfect body image in the media.
attributes.background: This is delicate issue as we a constantly bombarded with the media's idea's of the perfect body image. Generation by generation the idea of beauty is being abused and causing people to develop confusion towards what perfection looks like.

rejection.details: Your petition seems to be asking the media to take this action. We can only accept petitions that call for action from the Government or Parliament.
